content.2: Arise, go to Nineveh, that great city, and cry against it; for their wickedness is come up before me.

content.6: So the shipmaster came to him, and said unto him, What meanest thou, O sleeper? arise, call upon thy God, if so be that God will think upon us, that we perish not.

content.10: Then were the men exceedingly afraid, and said unto him, Why hast thou done this? For the men knew that he fled from the presence of the
content.11: Then said they unto him, What shall we do unto thee, that the sea may be calm unto us? for the sea wrought, and was tempestuous.

content.15: So they took up Jonah, and cast him forth into the sea: and the sea ceased from her raging.
